review: This had always been my favorite Applebee's. Consistently good perfect margaritas, quick seating, great Happy Hour!
1 star for being 2 blocks away from work 1 star for serving super cheap, super large beers 1 star for being kicked out from an Applebee's -YES, AN APPLEBEE'S- after 5 super cheap, super large beers
Fantastic happy hour! Cheap beers and appz.. can't go wrong with a tall stella and some boneless honey bbq wings!
I love their menu!  The garlic mashed potatoes-amazing!  Steak-melts in  your mouth!  Service - great!  Big fan of Applebee's!
